sidebar.content: If there is any information that is inaccurate, I apologize and welcome feedback. If there is an opinion you disagree with, such is life.

heading: Overview
block: The content has been broken into four main topics: Prototyping, Design Patterns, Development Tools, and AI. Game development can hardly fit into these few categories alone, but I tried to pick topics that I feel are a good starting point for learning more about game creation. If I were to expand the information presented, I would talk about procedural generation, physics, 2D and 3D lighting techniques, and so on.

Within each topic, I have given brief descriptions and have left some information out due to constraints. Each topic could have a whole site devoted to it, so I presented the information that seemed to be in the forefront of my mind.

heading: An offer of information
block: Through this site, I hope to pass on some of the information I have gathered about game development over the past few years. I am not an authority (I'm still learning as well!), but hopefully anyone who reads this and has thought about creating a game will find something of value (and perhaps save you some tears and frustration and late-night Googling).
